title: What LoL Zodiac are you?
body:
After looking through champions, i could determine that each of these could represent a member of the Zodiac:
{{champion:16}} Capricorn Soraka/ January 20 to February 16
{{champion:267}}  Aquarius Nami/ February 16 to March 11
{{champion:105}} Pisces Fizz/ March 11 to April 18
{{champion:201}}  Aries Braum/ April 18 to May 13
{{champion:12}}  Taurus Alistar/ May 13 to June 21
{{champion:7}}  Gemini Leblanc/ June 21 to July 20
{{champion:6}} Cancer Urgot/ July 20 to August 10
{{champion:107}}  Leo Rengar/ August 10 to September 16
{{champion:76}}  Virgo Nidalee/ September 16 to  October 30
{{champion:84}} Libra Akali/  October 30 to November 23
{{champion:72}} Scorpio Skarner/ November 23 to November 29
{{champion:69}} Ophiuchus Cassiopeia/ November 29 to December 17
{{champion:120}} Sagittarius Hecarim/ December 17 to January 20
The dates have changed due to the new discovery of a new constellation. View your birthday depending on the current horoscopes.
NOTE: if you were born before 2010, you will still be considered the previous horoscope of just 12 Zodiacs:
Aries
March 21 - April 19

Taurus
April 20 -May 20

Gemini
May 21 -June 20

Cancer
June 21 -July 22

Leo
July 23 -August 22

Virgo
August 23 -September 22

Libra
September 23 -October 22

Scorpio
October 23 -November 21

Sagittarius
November 22 -December 21

Capricorn
December 22 -January 19

Aquarius
January 20 -February 18

Pisces
February 19 -March 20

So what Zodaic LoL champion are you?

replies.body: I'm Virgo (Nidalee?), I like the symbol. Not sure if it make sense to be Nidalee, but I like to think of myself as possessing some kind of purity.. maybe purity of feeling, because I can't stand lying to myself and faking emotions like other people do. Maybe Sona would be better? I don't know.

HAHAHA URGOT AS CANCER.

I'm Le blanc. I HATE instakill champions.

WAIT WTF THE DATES CHANGED?! WTF IM ALISTAR. I NEED TO REVOTE I LOVE ALISTAR,

Oh wait nvm I'm still Le Blanc. Who the heck would be born after 2010? LOL.
Ophiuchus? lol the silly people trying to shove it into the current system. This has been going on for years now.
Pisces :( Sorry Fizz but i am just too close to Nami to pretend to be happy ahaha
Aquarius, or Pisces if referring back to the old zodiac set. Water is common here.
